server.model

Class Database

  • java.lang.Object
    • server.model.Database
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DBCredentials

    public class Database
extends java.lang.Object
implements DBCredentials
    A simple database class to work with SQL servers.
    Since:
    April 20th 2020
    Author:
    Ayush Chaudhari, Duan Le, Vu Ha
